basic.description:
An intensive survey of a topic within historical musicology, ethnomusicology, or popular music(s).
LEARNING HOURS    112 (36L;24O;52P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Topics in Music History and Culture II

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (MUSC 191/6.0 and MUSC 103/3.0 and [MUSC 203/3.0 or MUSC 204/3.0 or MUSC 205/3.0]) or permission of the School.
